alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:35AM MST until December 28 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations of a trace to 2 inches in the valleys and 2 to 4 inches over Marias Pass. Light freezing rain in the lower valleys. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph over the higher terrain. * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Marias Pass, and Polebridge. * WHEN...Through 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
